tidyList.title: open a file
tidyList.codebox:
text_file = open('/home/example/file.txt','r')
# ‘r’ : the file is opened in readonly mode
# ‘w’ : the file will be opened  write only mode. If file containing containing that name does not exists, it will create a new one
# ‘a’ : the output of that program will be append to the previous output of that file
# ‘r+’ : the file will be open for both reading and writing
